dialogue.speaker: generic
dialogue.text: [We continue with the group sitting outside and socializing.]

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Hey, uhh, Boyfriend is it?

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Bo?

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: I feel like we never really settled it, the last time we fought...

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Bop?

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: ...Settled on who is better at singing, that is!

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Boh.

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Oh, you two wanna battle right now? I can get some stuff together real quick, then!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Perfect! Oh, and while we're at it...

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: I want you to put on the longest instrumental you have!

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Damn, really?... Well, the best I can do is ten minutes!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Well, well! How's about a ten minute showdown, BF?

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Yeah!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Whoever outlasts the other will be proven the better singer.

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Hey... What about me? I did the singy thing.

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Oh, No thanks, Bambi. This is between me and him!

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: ... Fine!

dialogue.speaker: generic
dialogue.text: [Bambi grumbles, but sits down and spectates.]

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Alright, I hope you're ready, because I'm not going down without a fight!

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Beep bo bop!
